topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534df92663687279808f0000#post_534df92663687279808f0000
Were you banned from the mlp chat cause of trolling?

Unless you have people threatening to jihad you then you're not doing it right.

A proper example of trolling is saying something along the lines of, "The newer seasons of mlp will never live up to people's expectations cause they forget that it's a children's cartoon and thus make unrealistically high expectations of each episode that can never be satisfied so any new episode will always be thought down upon" or "The friendzone doesn't exist; you just suck at dating" or "*Almost* all of your favorite franchises ten years after it ends will be completely forgotten and you'll just be another old person complaining about kids these days" or "Even if you try and keep on top of social media you'll just be thought of as that creepy old man that hangs out with teens" or "Trying to prove that you're normal while a member of a fandom makes you look like one of those stereotypically whinny nerds and that bronies will won't be accepted for a long time because so long as you try to prove you're normal people will think of you as creepy internet dweller instead of a normal person".

I've gotten rage banned from a couple websites with these.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

nah i got banned on my own grounds,granted i was not liking the community much but guess my way of saying goodbye was a bit bombastic, im not asking for people to like go and attack mlp wiki, just saying i cant find a good chat to reside in anymore.
